InstructionData.Title: Solar tracker basic
InstructionData.Author: RZR0
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias pnlHoriz r0 alias pnlVert r1
move pnlHoriz 0 # Horizontal panel angle move pnlVert 0 # Vertical panel angle
main: s d1 Horizontal pnlHoriz s d1 Vertical pnlVert s d2 Horizontal pnlHoriz s d2 Vertical pnlVert s d3 Horizontal pnlHoriz s d3 Vertical pnlVert s d4 Horizontal pnlHoriz s d4 Vertical pnlVert
l pnlHoriz d0 Horizontal l r3 d0 Vertical sub pnlVert 90 r3 j main
